sentences.sContent: The focus is solely on the shirts and the hilarious design.
sentences.sContent_eng: The focus is solely on the shirts and the hilarious design.
sentences.sCn: 这些注意力完全放在衣服和欢闹的设计上了。

sentences.sContent: But I love my awful life so much right now, that I find it hilarious when I am unable to convince anyone else of it.
sentences.sContent_eng: But I love my awful life so much right now, that I find it hilarious when I am unable to convince anyone else of it.
sentences.sCn: 即时它摧毁了我的家，但现在十分我喜欢我糟糕的生活，当我不能使其他人确信是我发现它是欢闹的。

synos.tran: 欢闹的；非常滑稽的；喜不自禁的

words.tran: 引人发笑地；滑稽地；喜不自禁地
